definitions: lit. When we get to the mountain, there'll be a way through and when the boat gets to the pier-head, it will go straight with the current. (idiom)
Let's worry about it when it happens.
pinyin: che1 dao4 shan1 qian2 bi4 you3 lu4 , chuan2 dao4 qiao2 tou2 zi4 ran2 zhi2
simplified: 车到山前必有路，船到桥头自然直
traditional: 車到山前必有路，船到橋頭自然直
